page.title: 08Five Acres School Ambrosden
page.content: I go to a Primary School.When I am 11 I will go to a Secondary School until I'm 16.My school covers an area of 5 acres, which is how it got its name.Our school buildings are split into 2 departments: four Infants' classes for the 5\7 year-olds & 6 Junior classes for the 8\11yr-olds.We arrive at 8.55am &leave at 3pm, from Monday to Friday.Every morning,except Friday when we go swim- ming in Bicester Pool, we have Assembly when all the staff & children pray & sing hymns in the 2 Halls.On Wednesdays have games in the hall or on the field. On Thursdays we haveArt & Craft when we split into groups for things like paint -ing,clay modelling,sewing,collage,etc. Sometimes we use the computer or watch schools programmes on the TV.At 10.30we play on the playground or field for 15 minutes.At 3pm a bell rings & we walk or bus home.(C.NIZIOL & K.WHITE).
